article.title: Deep Learning Paradigm with Transformed Monolingual Word Embeddings for Multilingual Sentiment Analysis

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the main difference between the MT-Based Paradigm and the Deep Learning Paradigm shown in Figure 1?
choices: The MT-Based Paradigm uses machine translation for all languages, while the Deep Learning Paradigm only uses it for English.
The MT-Based Paradigm uses separate machine learning models for each language, while the Deep Learning Paradigm utilizes a single parameter-sharing model.
The Deep Learning Paradigm directly uses raw monolingual word embeddings, while the MT-Based Paradigm relies on machine translation.
The Deep Learning Paradigm does not require any pre-processing of text data, while the MT-Based Paradigm requires extensive pre-processing.

multiple_choice_question.text: What component within the LSTM memory block (Figure 2) controls how much of the previous cell state is passed through?
choices: Input Gate (it)
Output Gate (ot)
Forget Gate (ft)
Cell State (Ct)

multiple_choice_question.text: In the CNN Model (Figure 3), what technique is used to handle tweets of varying lengths and create a uniform matrix representation?
choices: Zero Padding
Max-Pooling
Convolution
Softmax

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the objective of the formula (1) in the context of the research paper?
choices: To maximize the similarity between word embeddings in different languages.
To minimize the difference between word embeddings in different languages.
To identify the most frequent words in each language.
To calculate the accuracy of machine translation for word pairs.

multiple_choice_question.text: Based on the data in Table 1, which of the following statements about the MDSU corpus is NOT accurate?
choices: The corpus has a relatively balanced distribution of positive, negative, and neutral sentiments across all languages.
The maximum tweet length (after preprocessing) is identical for English and Chinese languages in the corpus.
Japanese tweets in the corpus have a shorter maximum length compared to English and Chinese tweets.
The corpus contains a similar number of tweets for each of the three languages.
